item.title: In 'Alien: Earth', the Future Is a Corporate Hellscape
item.description: Alien: Earth creator Noah Hawley tells WIRED he imagined the planet’s future based on his fears as a parent about the present, from dystopian capitalism to the “moral horror” of growing up.

item.title: Paramount Has a $1.5 Billion ‘South Park’ Problem
item.description: The White House says the show is “fourth-rate” after it showed Trump with “tiny” genitals. The controversy comes just as the FCC has greenlit Paramount’s merger with Skydance and promised to end DEI.
